page.title: 08MILTON OF DUMBRECK
page.content: { Milton of Dumbreck}is owned by Aberdeen Endowments Trust and is {leased}to Mr. and Mrs. Forbes. The farm is a{mixed arable and beef farm of about 180 acres. The average field size is approximately{17.5 acres.}The farmer works an average 9-10 hour day except during busy periods when he works round the clock.He has up to date,modern machinery e.g.{combines, {sprayers}etc. which cuts his work load down and means he does not have to employ a{labourer}all year round, instead he takes on part time labour at{busy seasons. As half of the farm is arable,{fence {boundaries}are predominant,these need little maintenance.The fencing in cattle areas,however,needs{constant {attention}to ensure the cattle's safety.
